text:
AUTO1 (https://www.auto1.com/en) | Berlin, Germany | Java |Full-time, Onsite | Visa Sponsor

AUTO1 is looking for REST and microservices enthusiasts to join the fastest engineering team of 2016 in Berlin.

More details here: https://app.jobvite.com/j?cj=oTdE4fwy&s=Hacker_News

Send your CV to: bianca.alves@auto1.com

We have several Engineering job openings (PHP, Frontend, QA, Mobile), check our career page: https://www.auto1.com/en/jobs
